text: The Y2K EP was released in 1999 by Massachusetts band Converge as a limited 7" vinyl record for their 1999 European tour. It contains 3 tracks, all of which are covers. ==Track listing== Side A # "Serial Killer" (Vio-lence cover) - 2:37 # "Snowblind" (Black Sabbath cover) - 4:29 Side B # "Disintegration" (The Cure cover) - 6:42 ==References== Category:Albums with cover art by Jacob Bannon Category:1999 EPs
title: Y2K (EP)
